DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Performed Observation Outcome Data ACT I2B2 CDM Diagnosis Code System Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._Diagnosis coding system. ICD-9 is retained for older data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
